title: In Final Push for Votes, Both Parties Court Black Men
description: Democrats and Republicans see Black male voters as key in tight races. Most support Democrats, but some see Republicans as offering a better shot at upward mobility.
dc:creator: Clyde McGrady and Maya King

media:content.media:credit: Obinna Onyeka for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Howard Eddie, 51, a concert promoter who lives in Milwaukee, said the economy is at the top of his mind for the midterm election.
